name: Tablet
description: Client is a single mother to her teenage daughter and also taking care of her elderly mother in a low income household. Client is working full-time and recently decided to take a part-time diploma on weeknights to upskill herself. She requires a tablet, preferably with a smart pen, to aid in her studying. Please Whatsapp me at 62319407 if you have a suitable one to donate. Thank you!

name: Fridge
description: CT and his partner are young parents to a newborn, and the partner is currently pregnant. CT has been struggling to secure stable employment as he is also involved in caregiving responsibilities, particularly as his partner has been physically weak during this pregnancy. The family lacks informal support and relies on external organisations to meet their basic needs. Recently, their refrigerator and fan broke down, and they are unable to afford replacements. As such, the family requires assistance to obtain these essential household items.

name: Fridge
description:
The family consists of a daughter in her 40s and a mother in her late 70s. Both are homebound due to their medical conditions that causes them to have limitations in their mobility and they would regularly experience light-headedness that could potentially cause them to fall.

As both are not able to work, they are currently relying on some government payout and financial assistance. They would purchase some groceries and would cook meals and place their meals in the fridge to last them for a few days.They would also place some food items for prayers in their fridge as well. 

As their fridge are not functioning well lately, they would like to seek some help in getting a new fridge (as they are strict vegetarian) so that they could continue to store their meals and prayer items in the fridge. Thank you!
specifications: (w X h X d): 545 X 1700 X 625mm
